sections.heading: What is 〜ておく (te-oku)?
sections.content:
〜ておく expresses doing something in advance for future convenience or leaving something in a certain state. It emphasizes preparation or completing an action before it's needed.

[Verb te-form] + おく 買っておく "buy (in advance)" 調べておく "look up (beforehand)"

children.heading: Basic Pattern
children.content: Verb (te-form) + おく Plain: 〜ておく Polite: 〜ておきます 読んでおく / 読んでおきます "read (in advance)" 準備しておく / 準備しておきます "prepare (beforehand)"

children.heading: 1. Preparation (Do in Advance)
children.content:
Doing something beforehand for future use or convenience.

宿題をしておく "do homework (in advance)" 予約しておく "make a reservation (beforehand)" 買っておく "buy (in advance)" 調べておく "look up (beforehand)" 勉強しておく "study (in advance)"

children.heading: 2. Leave As Is
children.content:
Leaving something in a state intentionally.

窓を開けておく "leave the window open" 電気をつけておく "leave the light on" そのままにしておく "leave it as it is" 置いておく "leave it there" 待っておく "wait (and stay waiting)"

children.heading: 〜ておいた方がいい (had better do in advance)
children.content: 予約しておいた方がいいよ "You'd better make a reservation in advance" 確認しておいた方がいい "You'd better check beforehand" 準備しておいた方がいい "You'd better prepare in advance"

children.heading: 〜ておいてください (please do in advance)
children.content: 明日までに読んでおいてください "Please read it by tomorrow" 調べておいてください "Please look it up (beforehand)" 準備しておいてください "Please prepare it (in advance)"

children.heading: もう〜ておいた (already did in advance)
children.content: もう買っておいた "I already bought it" もう予約しておいた "I already made a reservation" もう調べておいた "I already looked it up"

children.heading: 〜ておこう (let's do in advance)
children.content:
Volitional form expressing intention to prepare.

予約しておこう "Let's make a reservation (in advance)" 買っておこう "Let's buy it (now for later)" 準備しておこう "Let's prepare (beforehand)" 調べておこう "Let's look it up (now)"

sections.heading: Casual Contraction: とく
sections.content:
In casual speech, ておく contracts to とく:

買っておく → 買っとく 読んでおく → 読んどく しておく → しとく 調べておく → 調べとく Examples: 買っとくね "I'll buy it (in advance)" 読んどいて "Read it (beforehand)" 準備しといて "Prepare it (in advance)"

children.heading: 〜ておかない
children.content: 予約しておかない "won't make a reservation in advance" 準備しておかない "won't prepare beforehand" 買っておかない "won't buy in advance"

children.heading: 〜ておかなくてもいい
children.content: 予約しておかなくてもいい "don't need to reserve in advance" 準備しておかなくてもいい "don't need to prepare beforehand"

children.heading: 〜ておかないと (if don't do in advance)
children.content: 予約しておかないと、入れない "If we don't reserve, we can't get in" 勉強しておかないと、テストができない "If I don't study beforehand, I can't do the test"

children.heading: 〜ておいた
children.content: 買っておいた "bought (in advance)" 予約しておいた "made a reservation (beforehand)" 準備しておいた "prepared (in advance)" 調べておいた "looked up (beforehand)"

children.heading: ておく vs てある
children.content: ておく: Action of preparing 食べ物を買っておく "buy food (in advance)" てある: Result of preparation 食べ物が買ってある "food has been bought"

children.heading: ておく vs ている
children.content: ておく: Deliberate preparation 窓を開けておく "leave window open (on purpose)" ている: Current state 窓が開いている "window is open"

children.heading: Study and Work
children.content: 勉強しておく - study in advance 準備しておく - prepare beforehand 練習しておく - practice beforehand 確認しておく - check in advance

children.heading: Daily Activities
children.content: 買っておく - buy in advance 作っておく - make beforehand 用意しておく - prepare beforehand 予約しておく - reserve in advance

children.heading: Information Gathering
children.content: 調べておく - look up beforehand 聞いておく - ask in advance 読んでおく - read beforehand 覚えておく - remember/memorize

children.heading: Maintenance
children.content: 掃除しておく - clean beforehand 洗っておく - wash in advance 直しておく - fix beforehand

children.heading: 〜までに〜ておく (by the time)
children.content: 明日までに読んでおく "read it by tomorrow" 来週までに準備しておく "prepare by next week" 会議までに調べておく "look it up before the meeting"

children.heading: 〜前に〜ておく (before)
children.content: 出発前に確認しておく "check before departure" 寝る前に宿題をしておく "do homework before sleeping"

children.heading: 今〜ておく (do it now for later)
children.content: 今買っておく "buy it now (for later)" 今のうちに準備しておく "prepare now while we can"

children.heading: Example 1: Making Preparations
children.content: A: 明日のパーティー、何か準備する？ "Should we prepare anything for tomorrow's party?" B: そうだね。飲み物を買っておこう "Yeah. Let's buy drinks in advance" A: 食べ物は？ "What about food?" B: もう作っておいたよ "I already made it"

children.heading: Example 2: Advice
children.content: A: 明日、早く起きないといけないんだ "I have to wake up early tomorrow" B: じゃあ、今晩早く寝ておいた方がいいよ "Then you'd better go to bed early tonight" A: そうするよ。ありがとう "I will. Thanks"

children.heading: Example 3: Checking if Something is Done
children.content: A: レポート、もう書いた？ "Did you write the report already?" B: うん、昨日書いておいた "Yeah, I wrote it yesterday (in advance)" A: すごい！早いね "Wow! That's fast"

children.heading: Example 4: Leaving Something in a State
children.content: A: 窓、閉める？ "Should I close the window?" B: いや、開けておいて "No, leave it open" A: わかった "Got it"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Confusing with ている
children.content: Context: Preparation Wrong: 予約している (when meaning "made in advance") ⚠️ Better: 予約しておく ✓ "make a reservation in advance" Note: している can mean "is making" or "has made"

children.heading: Mistake 2: Using for unintentional actions
children.content: Wrong: 雨が降っておく ❌ Right: 雨が降っている ✓ "It's raining" Note: ておく implies intentional human action

children.heading: Mistake 3: Overusing in casual speech
children.content: Too formal: 毎日勉強しておきます Natural: 毎日勉強します "I study every day" Note: ておく emphasizes preparation, not routine

children.heading: Preparation for Future Benefit
children.content: 薬を買っておく "buy medicine (so I'll have it when needed)" 傘を持っておく "take an umbrella (in case it rains)"

children.heading: Thoughtfulness
children.content:
Using ておく can show consideration:

コーヒーを入れておきました "I made coffee (for you/us)" 席を予約しておきました "I reserved seats (for us)"

children.heading: Responsibility
children.content: 宿題をしておかないと "I have to do homework (beforehand)" 準備しておく必要がある "Need to prepare in advance"

children.heading: 覚えておく (remember/keep in mind)
children.content: これを覚えておいてください "Please remember this" 名前を覚えておく "remember the name"

children.heading: 取っておく (save/keep)
children.content: あなたの分を取っておく "save your portion" これは取っておいて "keep this (for later)"

children.heading: しておく (do/leave it)
children.content:
Very common general use:

これ、しておいて "Do this (beforehand)" そのままにしておく "leave it as is"

children.heading: 〜ておいてもいい (may leave)
children.content: 窓を開けておいてもいいですか？ "May I leave the window open?" ここに置いておいてもいい？ "Is it okay to leave it here?"

children.heading: 〜ておいてはいけない (must not leave)
children.content: ドアを開けておいてはいけない "You must not leave the door open" そのままにしておいてはいけない "You must not leave it as is"

children.heading: Casual
children.content: 買っとく "I'll buy it" 読んどいて "Read it (beforehand)"

children.heading: Polite
children.content: 買っておきます "I will buy it (in advance)" 読んでおいてください "Please read it (beforehand)"

children.heading: Very Polite
children.content: 準備しておきます "I will prepare it (in advance)" ご確認しておいてください "Please check (beforehand)"

children.heading: Kansai Dialect
children.content:
In Kansai, different contractions exist:

Standard: 買っておく → 買っとく Kansai: 買っておく → 買うとく / 買っとく

children.heading: Written vs. Spoken
children.content: Written: 準備しておく Spoken casual: 準備しとく Spoken polite: 準備しておきます

children.heading: Preparation
children.content: 明日までに読んでおいてください "Please read it by tomorrow" 会議の前に資料を準備しておきます "I'll prepare materials before the meeting" 旅行の前に予約しておいた方がいい "You'd better make reservations before the trip" 今のうちに買っておこう "Let's buy it now (while we can)"

children.heading: Leaving in a State
children.content: 窓を開けておいてください "Please leave the window open" 電気をつけておきます "I'll leave the light on" そのままにしておいて "Leave it as is" ここに置いておく "I'll leave it here"

children.heading: Past Actions
children.content: もう予約しておいた "I already made a reservation" 昨日買っておいた "I bought it yesterday (in advance)" 前に調べておいたから知ってる "I know because I looked it up beforehand"

children.heading: Advice and Suggestions
children.content: 早めに予約しておいた方がいいよ "You'd better reserve early" 確認しておいてください "Please check beforehand" これは覚えておいて "Remember this"

children.heading: Casual Contractions
children.content: 買っとくね "I'll buy it" 準備しといて "Prepare it (in advance)" 調べとく "I'll look it up" 読んどく "I'll read it (beforehand)"

sections.heading: Related Grammar Points
sections.content: 〜てある (te-aru) - Resultant state 〜ている (te-iru) - Progressive/state Te-form Conjugation - Basic te-form 〜ておいた方がいい - Had better do 〜てください - Request patterns Volitional Form - Let's expressions

examples.sentence: 〜ておいた方がいい - Had better do
